turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I'm busy driving and would like you to order a coffee for me from Peets

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'd be happy to do that for you! At which location do you want to pick up your drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: At 20 North Michigan ave.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect! What can I order for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like an Iced caffe Mocha

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, and what size

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Medium, please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And your milk preference?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What options do they offer?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Non-fat milk, 2% milk, whole milk, soy milk, almond milk

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, I'll take soy milk please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want whipped cream on that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, let me go ahead and order that for you!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Can I have your number yet?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I ordered a medium iced caffe mocha with soy milk and whipped cream for you at 20 North Michigan Ave. You will receive a text shortly with an update on your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome, thanks a lot!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're quite welcome!
